name: Captain's Basics Adventure in a broken underwater ship v1.4.3 port
name_original: Captain's Basics Adventure in a broken underwater ship v1.4.3 port
description:
This is another hard port i tryed to make, if you like it comment me, if you know how to do black fog, tell me i honestly dont.

NOTICE: This mod shows the old times when billy was a kid.

Well well it's your worst day,  because the underwater ship is broken! But the good thing is, after the engine exploding There are 4 parts scattered in that ship, and you have to collect them, Not only Parts you also need books, Because you're not smart enough to put those parts back to work! Captain will give you mathematic problems to test your intelligence! Why? you may ask, It's for the reconstructing the parts, that's why you know...

-We are on DEMO RELEASE!-

Credits:

@Le Billy - Original Mod

@CCModder/BFGameplays - Port to 1.4.3.
